{{about|all changes made to block textures|the texture atlas that housed all block textures before Java Edition 1.5|terrain.png}}
{{update}}
This page attempts to document the full history of the [[List of block textures|textures of blocks]], their additions, changes, and removals. Additions and changes made to the models of blocks and any new blocks that reuse prior textures will '''not''' be documented here. Texture files that are completely identical to other texture files will also be largely ignored for the time being.

== List ==
=== Used block textures ===
{{info needed section|
* Differences to investigate according to winmerge results (many may just be insignificant compression differences):
** Enchanting table bottom texture changed in 18w44a and 18w50a
* Water overlay texture used for water against glass and co. MC-35790 implied a 15w43b introduction, MC-128276 a 18w22b change and 1.16-pre5's changelogs a darkening, but these all need confirmed
* Possible other changes to tripwire in 1.3, with the addition of more opaque lines?
* All textures added in 1.20 onwards including the April Fools updates for 2024 and 2025
}}
